name: Qyn
description:
Qyn is an isometric action-adventure game that delves into a world filled with exploration, fighting and character relationships. With fast paced combat and diverse characters, follow Qyn’s story as she strives to save the world and conquer dungeons.

Qyn is an adventurous archaeologist, who uses skills picked up on her travels to battle her way through the beautiful hand-painted region of Elberra. Her homeland destroyed, and a magical sword in hand, Qyn is ever seeking to restore peace to the land.

Qyn is currently in a prototype phase.
